name: Possescort
description:
You know, like possess and escort. Get it? Anyone?

You control a ghost trying to help a robot reach the end of a dungeon. You help by possessing the monsters and using them to fight and protect the robot. You lose if the robot dies. 

I was busy this week so I didn't get to use the full 3 days. The game might be kind of buggy.

Menu theme and most sound effects are from copyright free sound packs, everything else was made by me.

Made for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0

Theme: Collaborate with AI
